--- title: Rule Set 3 keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Python package to predict the activity of CRISPR sgRNA sequences using Rule Set 3" description: "Python package to predict the activity of CRISPR sgRNA sequences using Rule Set 3" nb_path: "index.ipynb" ---
{% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Install

pip install git+ssh://git@github.com/gpp-rnd/rs3.git

How to use

Import packages

{% raw %} 
from rs3.seq import predict_seq
{% endraw %}

Create a list of context sequences you want to predict

{% raw %} 
context_seqs = ['GACGAAAGCGACAACGCGTTCATCCGGGCA', 'AGAAAACACTAGCATCCCCACCCGCGGACT']
{% endraw %}

Predict on sequences using the predict_seq function

{% raw %} 
predict_seq(context_seqs)

array([0.28923641, 0.78714099])
{% endraw %}
